#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.71a server runs under Linux and BSD.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:
    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the BigBlueButton Virtual Machine] 
    * Install from source on [InstallingBigBlueButton Ubuntu] (0.71a)
    * Install from source on [InstallationBigBlueButtonDebian Debian] (0.70)
    * Install from source on [InstallingBigBlueButtonFreeBSD Install on FreeBSD/PC-BSD] (0.70)

Instructions for 0.64 release:
    * [RPMPackaging Install on CentOS 5.4 32-bit/64-bit (15 minutes)]
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonFedora Install from source (Fedora)] 
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonCentOS Install from source (CentOS)] 

Regardless of the way you choose, the following page shows the configuration files:

   * [ConfigurationFiles Configuration Files]
